ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Weapons on Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: My pet wont equip one, I ve tried but it doesnt matter anyways as they wont do more dmg even with higher dmg weapons. Mu ... From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield
ygData.messageBody:
My pet wont equip one, I've tried but it doesnt matter anyways as they wont
do more dmg even with higher dmg weapons.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 17, 2001 11:34 PM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [EverQuest] Weapons on Pets


That reminds me....I've heard that pet's have a static delay time when
swinging...

If this is true...then wouldn't it be great to hand your pet a weighted axe?
50 dam 150 delay ( i think these are the stats )
